13 {
19  public sealed class AIPlayer : MonoBehaviour, IPlayer
20  {
24  [SerializeField] private bool isActive = true;
25 
29  [SerializeField] [ThinkerList] private string selectedThinker = null;
30 
34  [SerializeField] private string thinkerParams = "";
35 
36  // A reference to the thinker's prototype
37  private ThinkerPrototype thinkerPrototype;
38 
41  public bool IsActive => isActive;
42 
45  public string ThinkerFQN => selectedThinker;
46 
50  public ThinkerPrototype ThinkerPrototype
51  {
52  get
53  {
54  // The underlying thinker prototype is lazy instantiated
55  if (thinkerPrototype == null)
56  {
57  // Obtain the component holding the game configuration
58  IMatchConfig matchConfig = GetComponent<IMatchConfig>();
59 
60  thinkerPrototype = new ThinkerPrototype(
61  selectedThinker, thinkerParams, matchConfig);
62  }
63 
64  // Return the underlying thinker prototype
65  return thinkerPrototype;
66  }
67  }
68 
75  public override string ToString() => selectedThinker;
76  }
77 }
